tool_description: Do you want to get paid for the rest of your life? This is your game! Introducing the latest winning numbers and the best statistics!

api_list.name: Drawings Between Dates
api_list.description: Get all Cash4Life winning number sets between two specified dates where the first number supplied is the beginning date and the second number supplied is the end date.

required_parameters.name: date1
required_parameters.description: The start date for the range of drawings.

required_parameters.name: date2
required_parameters.description: The end date for the range of drawings.

api_list.name: Drawing by Date
api_list.description: Get the winning Cash4Life number set from a specific drawing date.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The specific date for which to retrieve the winning numbers.

api_list.name: General Statistics
api_list.description: This endpoint pulls basic statistics of the Cash4Life numbers, including mean, median, mode, min, max, standard deviation, variance, skewness, and kurtosis for each ball.

api_list.name: Latest Drawing
api_list.description: Get the latest winning Cash4Life number set.

api_list.name: Random QuickPick for Play
api_list.description: Get a quickpick number for the Cash4Life drawing.
